title: Woman Hailed as Hero for Smashing Man’s Meta Smart Glasses on Subway
description: "I hope she called him a dork for wearing them before she broke them."

title: Meta delays release of new mixed reality glasses code-named 'Phoenix' in order to 'get the details right'
description: Meta plans to release a new wearable device codenamed "Malibu 2" in 2026, according to an internal memo viewed by Business Insider.

title: How a 24-year-old Stanford Ph.D. dropout lured some of Meta's brightest minds to join her AI math startup
description: 24-year-old Axiom Math founder Carina Hong wooed top Meta researchers in a competitive AI talent market.

title: It’s ‘kind of jarring’: AI labs like Meta, Deepseek, and Xai earned some of the worst grades possible on an existential safety index
description: Anthropic, OpenAI, and Google DeepMind took the top three spots with an overall grade of C+ or C.

title: The Meta Ray-Ban Smart Glasses Are at Their All-Time Lowest Price Right Now
description: Wearable smart tech that lets you do it all—without your phone.

title: No, Meta Is Not Scraping Your DMs to Train Its AI
description: That doesn't mean your messages are necessarily private, either.

title: Meta delays release of Phoenix mixed-reality glasses to 2027, Business Insider reports
Meta’s Zuckerberg plans deep cuts for metaverse efforts
description: Meta confirmed a reduction in resources for the metaverse, and said savings are expected to funnel toward other futuristic projects within Reality Labs.

title: Meta Chief AI Scientist Yann LeCun says the Big Tech giant won't be investing in his new startup
description: Meta Chief AI Scientist Yann LeCun is leaving Meta to launch his own AI startup. He said Meta would be a partner, but not an investor.

title: Meta CEO Mark Zuckerberg went all in on the metaverse. Now Reality Labs is facing big cuts.
description: Meta plans Reality Labs budget cuts up to 30%, weighing job cuts amid metaverse losses and renewed focus on AI technology.

title: Read the internal memo that Meta's top lawyer behind its FTC victory sent announcing she's leaving for Apple
description: Jennifer Newstead led Meta's legal team through major regulatory battles, including an FTC antitrust win.

title: Meta hires longtime Apple design leader Alan Dye to run a new Reality Labs creative studio
description: Meta hires Apple design leader Alan Dye to head Reality Labs creative studio, focusing on design, AI, smart glasses, and next-gen technology.

title: The list of major companies laying off staff this year includes Verizon, IBM Amazon, Starbucks, American Airlines, and more
description: Layoffs have hit companies from American Airlines to Meta to Intel this year amid a backdrop of cost-cutting and technological change.

title: Nvidia stock falls after report says Google, Meta in talks for multibillion-dollar AI chip deal
description: Nvidia stock fell amid a report from The Information that Google is in talks with Meta for a big chip deal.

title: Google's on a roll — and Nvidia and other chipmakers are feeling the heat
description: Meta is reportedly considering buying Google's AI chips for its data centers in the coming years, adding to the selling pressure on Nvidia stock.

title: Meta and Google Discuss Deploying TPUs in Meta Datacenters Starting 2027
description: Investing.com -- Google is sharply escalating its bid to rival Nvidia in the AI chip race, and Meta is emerging as a potential multibillion-dollar customer, The Information reported Monday evening. For years, Google has limited its custom tensor processing units (TPUs) to its own cloud data centers, renting them out to companies running large-scale AI workloads. title: I was laid off by Meta and became a boomerang employee 3 years later. Here's why I decided to return.
description: Meta boomerang employee Devang Sharma shares why he returned after a 2023 layoff and offers advice for rejoining a former employer.

title: Meta buried ’causal’ evidence of social media harm, US court filings allege
I visited Meta's NYC pop-up. It felt like a mix of an Apple store and Warby Parker, with no expense spared.
description: Meta's two-story retail store in New York features a wall of Ray-Ban AI glasses and subtle touches, like ping pong paddle mirrors and skate art.
